description: developing a dashboard for our customers to view their analysis results, gain insight into their gut health and receive analysis-based recommendations. building our in-house laboratory software that manages and controls the entire workflow from test kit building to logistics handling and analysis completion.

implemented software for recording, managing and analysing measurements, with a focus on displaying complex visualisations and creating a scientific user experience. the software is used in laboratories all over the world and is therefore subject to strict regulations.
prototyped an internal reporting application to display social media performance data, connecting various apis to get an overall performance view.

established the it infrastructure as a working student. supporting the agency growing from 15 employees to 50+ employees. created the onnboarding and offboarding process, helping new employees collaborating with the team.
